article.headline: Colorado 88, Northern Colorado 86
article.story: BOULDER, Colo. (AP) -- Jermyl Jackson-Wilson scored just three points all night but had the winning basket at the buzzer to give Colorado an 88-86 win over Northern Colorado on Saturday night. Richard Roby had 21 points and 10 rebounds for Colorado (3-4), and Dominique Coleman also had 21 points. Xavier Silas added 17 points. Colorado led by as many as 10 in the second half, but the Bears, making their transition to Division I, clawed back. Will Figures made a 3-pointer with 28 seconds left for Northern Colorado (1-7) to tie it 86-86, and Colorado tried to run out the clock. With two seconds left, Roby missed a jumper and Coleman got the rebound but also missed the basket. Jackson-Wilson came up with the rebound and put in the layup for the win. Late in the second half, Kirk Archibeque was called for a technical foul, and Roby made three free throws to give Colorado an 80-73 lead with 3:06 to go. Dwayne Birden and Sean Taibi each made 3-pointers and two free throws down the stretch to get Northern Colorado within one at 84-83 before Silas made two foul shots to give Colorado an 86-84 lead. Archibeque had 14 points and 11 rebounds for the Bears, and Taibi had 16 points. Jefferson Mason scored 15 points off the bench.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
